title: BFUHS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 406 Staff Nurse Posts
description: The Baba Farid University of Health Sciences (BFUHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 406 Staff Nurse Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, B.Sc Nursing, or GNM can apply for the BFUHS Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection pro...
